meta_description: Discover exciting Programs & Events at the New Britain Youth Museum. Stay tuned for upcoming events in New Britain, CT. Join us today!
admission_text:
# Membership

How Far Will Your Membership Take You?

Signing up is easier than ever!

[Enroll Online ](https://nbymhnc.recdesk.com/Community/Membership)

OR

[Printable Membership Form ](https://www.hungerfordnaturecenter.org/_files/ugd/bcfc1e_76e26e60b9634bef9b4922aa39a61349.pdf)

Please note that guest add-ons are only available to members with Family or Reciprocal memberships.

[Reciprocal Program Lists ](https://www.hungerfordnaturecenter.org/membership)

[Frequently Asked Questions ](https://www.hungerfordnaturecenter.org/membership)

Exclusive Member Events​

​​

One Membership - Endless Discovery​

  * Hungerford Nature Center (Berlin, CT)

  * Discounted or FREE admission to over 180 nature centers and 300 gardens and museums nationwide.

  * Family Membership Includes:

    * The Association of Nature Center Administrators (ANCA),

    * The American Horticulture Society (AHS)

    * The Reciprocal Organization of Associated Museums (ROAM).

  * Reciprocal Membership Includes:​​

  *     * The Association of Nature Center Administrators (ANCA),

    * The American Horticulture Society (AHS)

    * The Reciprocal Organization of Associated Museums (ROAM). 

    * North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM)

    * Association of Science and Technology Centers (ASTC)

    * NEW Association of Children's Museums (ACM)

*Local restrictions apply*​​​​

[Member Only Events ](https://www.hungerfordnaturecenter.org/memberonlyevents)

Discounted Programs

collections_text:
# We are REIMAGINING the New Britain Youth Museum.  
The 30 High Street location in New Britain will be closed during this process. During the reimagining process, we are offering even more programs and exhibits for our young explorers and families.
